name: Squarently: Binary Illusions
description:
Squarently: Binary Illusions is a small rage platformer that awards a good understanding of it's movement in it's gameplay.

Follow an odd square creature fall into the clasp's of a mysterious voice, and go through the various trials set upon the creature. Utilize your wave-dashing, slide-cancelling, and double jumping to squeeze past the blazing obstacles as you make your way to that delicious point.

If you especially enjoyed the game or want to support me, you can do so by purchasing the deluxe edition, which comes with 4 more incomplete games that inspired this one, the first build of the game, the OST, the cover art and it's project files, concept art, developer commentary, and an extra post-game content feature.

Squarently: Binary Illusions takes place in the same universe as Landimizer's Squarently: https://landimizer.itch.io/squarently
